Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ngakube umuntu ucabanga ukuthi uzoyekwa evinjiwe
Wayeseba yihlule legazi ngakho-ke (uMvelinqangi) wadala (ubuyena) walinganisa (ubuyena)
Ngempela ngakube safika yini kumuntu isikhathi lapho ayengeyilutho engacatshangwa
Ngempela thina samdala umuntu ngesidoda esihlangene (sowesilisa nowesifazane) samlinga sabe sesimenzela ukuzwa nokubona
Ngempela thina samholela endleleni ukuze abe ngobongayo noma ongabongi
Ngempela sabalungiselela abangakholwa amaketango namakhamandela nomlilo
Ngempela abalungile bayophuzela enkomishini (yewayini) elihlanganiswe namakha
